Package jopt.csp.spi.search.actions

Class Summary
AddConstraintAction Adds a constraint during a search that can be undone as search routine backtracks
AssignDoubleAction Action that assigns a single value to a numeric variable
AssignFloatAction Action that assigns a single value to a numeric variable
AssignIntegerAction Action that assigns a single value to a numeric variable
AssignLongAction Action that assigns a single value to a numeric variable
GenerateDoubleAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables.
GenerateFloatAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables.
GenerateIntegerAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables.
GenerateLongAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables.
GenerateSetAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables.
InstantiateDoubleAction Action that will attempt to assign a value to an real-number based variable using the search tree.
InstantiateFloatAction Action that will attempt to assign a value to an real-number based variable using the search tree.
InstantiateIntegerAction Action that will attempt to assign a value to an integer variable using the search tree.
InstantiateLongAction Action that will attempt to assign a value to a long variable using the search tree.
InstantiateSetAction Action that will produce a search node that attempts to assign a value to a set variable.
NonBinaryGenerateIntegerAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables
NonBinaryInstantiateIntegerAction Action that will produce a search node that attempts to assign a value to an integer variable by creating a choicepoint where each route will set the variable to a single value
RemoveDoubleAction Action that removes a single value from the domain of a numeric variable
RemoveFloatAction Action that removes a single value from the domain of a numeric variable
RemoveIntegerAction Action that removes a single value from the domain of a numeric variable
RemoveLongAction Action that removes a single value from the domain of a numeric variable
RestoreSolutionAction This action will apply all changes contained in the solution to variables in the problem.
SplitGenerateIntegerAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables
SplitGenerateLongAction Action that will generate values for an array of variables
SplitInstantiateIntegerAction Action that creates a choicepoint where one choice will instantiate an integer node by restricting the domain of a variable to the lower half of the domain and the other choice will use the upper half
SplitInstantiateLongAction Action that creates a choicepoint where one choice will instantiate an integer node by restricting the domain of a variable to the lower half of the domain and the other choice will use the upper half
StoreSolutionAction Action that will store all information for the current problem state in a solution that can be restored at a later date.
